DOC.brief_title: Controlled Clinical Study Determine Novel Health Benefits Cheese Consumption
DOC.detailed_description: Summary Proposed Research : This project involve four control 4 wk feeding period individual metabolic syndrome ( currently 1/3 US adult ) . After 2 wk run-in period , 20 subject feed one three diet randomize balanced order : typical American High-Carb diet high cheese ( 6 oz/day ) , High-Carb diet low cheese ( 0 oz/day ) , Moderate-Carb , high-cheese diet ( 6 oz/day ) , Low-Carb , high cheese cheese displaces isocaloric amount carbohydrate . There 2 wk washout period separate trial subject consume normal diet . Specific menu design feed phase food prepared subject . Testing occur baseline feeding period . Measures cholesterol beyond standard LDL- HDL-cholesterol do examine lipoprotein particle size , apolipoproteins , fatty acid composition [ i.e. , accumulation saturate fat blood tissue , palmitoleic acid ( highly link cardiovascular disease ) , detection phytanic acid ( uniquely bioactive fatty acid dairy fat ) ] . Changes whole body regional fat , include measure visceral fat liver fat , examine non-invasively dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) .
DOC.criteria: Waist circumference ( ≥101.6 cm men , ≥88.9 cm woman ) Blood pressure ( ≥130/85 mm Hg ) current use antihypertensive medication Fasting plasma glucose ( ≥100 mg/dL ) Triglycerides ( ≥150 mg/dL ) HDLC ( < 40 mg/dL men , < 50 mg/dL woman ) Hypercholesterolemia Diabetes Liver , kidney metabolic endocrine dysfunction , gastrointestinal disorder Regular smoker Lactoseintolerant Consume excessive amount alcohol ( > 3 drinks/d ) Have use cholesterol , diabetic , antibiotic antifungal medication past 3 month Women pregnant lactating Participants take probiotic supplement know affect serum lipid level , inflammation , antioxidant status gut microbiota ask discontinue use allow washout metabolic effect .
